title: Hiyou
description: HiYou is a feature-rich chat application built with HTML5, powered by Bootstrap 5 and JavaScript for an interactive user experience. Leveraging the Laravel framework on the backend, it ensures seamless integration, enhanced functionality, and optimal responsiveness.

title: Tasks
description: Tasks is a web application designed for managing your daily to-dos effortlessly. It allows you to add tasks, prioritize them by pinning, remove tasks when they're completed, and mark tasks as checked off.

title: Sofinord
description: Sofinord is a website representing a company specializing in Industrial Maintenance and Supplies

title: Wagen
description: WAGEN is an innovative online marketplace dedicated to facilitating the buying and selling of cars in pristine condition.
